question: I have a question regarding competitions, There are 3 ways to enter a competition [1] by text , [2] by phone , [3] by email . So are we allowed to enter the competitions by email.
answer:
QUESTION

I have a question regarding competitions,  There are 3 ways to enter  a competition  [1] by text  , [2] by phone , [3] by email .  So are we allowed to enter the competitions by email.

All prizes would be lawfull within shariah p.s there is no other fee involved.

 

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

If there are no monetary charges for entering the competition via e-mail and the sponsors of the competition are merely gifting away certain prizes, it will be permissible to enter such a competition.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Ml. Yusuf bin Yaqub,
Student Darul Iftaa

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
